com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization

Annotation Type TypeId


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface TypeId

    The TypeId annotation class is used to assign a type id to any class that needs type id information, like any subclass of Marshallable or Packet. Also Marshallers need to have a registered type id and their implementation might require an additional one for serialized objects if the same Marshaller is usable for multiple types.

    As an alternative of using this annotation, users can choose to implement Identifiable with a generic type of Short to return a legal type id for their class.

    This annotation is part of the bundled and default serialization framework and might not be required or used for externally developed protocols and codecs. It also always requires the primary type id to be of type short which can change for other protocols, too.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      short value
      Returns the assigned type id value.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract short value
        Returns the assigned type id value.
        Returns:
        the type id
